doc.name: input-email
doc.synopsis: How to render an email input field
doc.description: When rendering an email input field, the browser will check if it is a valid email address.
doc.parameters:
type="email"

All other valid parameters for an input field are valid
doc.example: <wsfield type="email" name="mail" placeholder="Type your email address" required="required" />
doc.note: All attributes for an email input field are supported (like in this case : name, placeholder and required.)
